client_name.description: The full name of the client or customer to whom the invoice is issued. Look for labels such as 'Client', 'Bill To', or 'Customer'.

client_address.description: The complete address of the client or customer, including street, city, state, and postal code. Usually found near the client name.

seller_name.description: The full name of the seller, vendor, or company issuing the invoice. Look for labels such as 'Seller', 'From', or 'Supplier'.

seller_address.description: The complete address of the seller or company issuing the invoice, including street, city, state, and postal code. Usually found near the seller name.

invoice_number.description: The unique invoice number assigned to this document. Look for labels such as 'Invoice No', 'Invoice Number', or similar.

invoice_date.description: The date when the invoice was issued. Look for labels such as 'Invoice Date', 'Date of Issue', or similar.

tax.description: The total tax amount applied to the invoice. Look for a summary section or a line labeled 'Tax', 'VAT', or 'Sales Tax'.

discount.description: The total discount amount applied to the invoice, if any. Look for a summary section or a line labeled 'Discount'.

total.description: The grand total amount due for the invoice, after taxes and discounts. Look for a summary section or a line labeled 'Total', 'Amount Due', or 'Grand Total'.

item_1_description.description: The description of the first item or product listed in the invoice's itemized section. This may include product name, model, or details.

item_1_quantity.description: The quantity or number of units for the first item listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_1_total_price.description: The total price for the first item, including any taxes or discounts applied to that line.

item_2_description.description: The description of the second item or product listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_2_quantity.description: The quantity or number of units for the second item listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_2_total_price.description: The total price for the second item, including any taxes or discounts applied to that line.

item_3_description.description: The description of the third item or product listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_3_quantity.description: The quantity or number of units for the third item listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_3_total_price.description: The total price for the third item, including any taxes or discounts applied to that line.

item_4_description.description: The description of the fourth item or product listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_4_quantity.description: The quantity or number of units for the fourth item listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_4_total_price.description: The total price for the fourth item, including any taxes or discounts applied to that line.

item_5_description.description: The description of the fifth item or product listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_5_quantity.description: The quantity or number of units for the fifth item listed in the invoice's itemized section.

item_5_total_price.description: The total price for the fifth item, including any taxes or discounts applied to that line.
